greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Permutation of natural numbers: a(1) = 1, a(lucky(n)) = ludic(1+a(n-1)), a(unlucky(n)) = nonludic(a(n)), where lucky(n) = n-th lucky number A000959, unlucky(n) = n-th unlucky number A050505, and ludic = A003309, nonludic = A192607.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: As a composition of other permutations:
xref: Related or similar permutations: A237126, A255421, A257725, A257732.
